attributes.action: Prevent lorries from using any road between the hours of 08:00hrs and 20:00hrs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Removing lorries from daytime road use would reduce emmisions and delays. Like an economy seven heating for the roads!
Twelve hours night time use from 20:00hrs to 08:00hrs is sufficient to get stuff done and will be more efficient for the lorries as fewer delays.
Fines should be introduced for those not adhering to the ban

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
